about_the_game:
This game is a highly difficult mountain climbing physics action game.
All you need to do is one click and force roll.
Its maneuvers make it difficult to climb and it is a very tough road to reach the end point.
But if you don't give up, you'll definitely get there



This is a story about a moon that fell from the sky.

You must operate the moon's "Koromun" to climb a steep mountain and return to where you came from.
However, the round moon Koromun cannot perform actions such as jumping, and can only roll as hard as he can.
Climbing is difficult, and once you fall down a mountain, even stopping is not easy.
I'm sure you'll fall and be brought back down many times.
Still, Koromun has to climb.
To return to the moon that illuminates the darkness of the world.

Distribution guidelines

Monetization distribution is possible for individuals and corporations without permission.
Please include the title of this game in your video, broadcast title, or thumbnail.
This is optional, but we would appreciate it if you could include the URL of this game's Steam store in the description.
We are not responsible for any damage caused by distributing videos of this game.
The contents of these guidelines are subject to change without notice.
